Customizing Tasks

Enterprise Advantage offers a repository customization feature that permits companies to create custom fields. If your administrator has created custom fields for the Task component, you may be required to complete these fields when entering or modifying tasks or subtasks. The availability of this feature depends upon your application license.

To customize tasks:

  1. Select a folder from the folder hierarchy.

  2. Click the Task tab on the upper pane.

  3. Do one of the following:

    • Double-click a task or subtask in the task tree or list.

    • Select a task or subtask, then select Properties from the Task menu or the context menu.

    The Task Properties dialog opens.

  4. Select the Custom tab.

  5. Double-click the name of a custom property. The Edit Property dialog opens.

  6. Select a new value for this property. For integer, text, and real fields, Value is a text box. For enumerated types and user IDs, it is a list box. For dates and times, Value has a date check box and a time check box, each of which is followed by a date or time in the format for your locale.

  7. Repeat steps 5 and 6 for other custom properties.

  8. Click OK.
